description:
The PC-96 is a cost-effective thermal cycler designed to deliver stable and uniform temperature control, even when working with a limited budget.

Equipped with 6 Peltier modules forming 3 independent temperature zones, it ensures excellent temperature accuracy and uniformity across all 96 wells. The instrument features dual side air outlets and two powerful heating fans, enabling rapid and efficient cooling.

With a user-friendly touchscreen interface and a stylus pen for precise operation, the PC-96 is easy to use. It supports a temperature gradient of up to 42°C, making it ideal for touch-down PCR and long-time PCR protocols.

Whether you're running standard amplification or optimizing reaction conditions, the PC-96 is a reliable partner in your molecular biology workflow. MaxMed UAE is the leading supplier of PCR & Molecular Analysis in Dubai and across the United Arab Emirates. We provide professional PCR & Molecular Analysis with same-day quotes, fast delivery, installation support, and comprehensive after-sales service. Contact us at +971 55 460 2500 for expert consultation and competitive pricing.
